dt-option.name: searchBuilder.greyscale

type.description: When `true`, remove the colours from SearchBuilder.

dt-option.description:
This option is an alias to `-feature searchBuilder.greyscale`, which should be preferred when using DataTables 2+. It can be used to configure SearchBuilder regardless of how the panes are inserted into the document (`-init layout` or `-button searchBuilder`).
Please refer to the documentation for `-feature searchBuilder.greyscale` for full details of this option.
